mapper.select: SELECT d.donator_name ,dsr.donation_spend_report_title ,dsr.donation_spend_report_no ,LEFT(dsr.donation_spend_report_date,10) AS donation_spend_report_date FROM donator AS d JOIN donation_spend_report AS dsr ON d.donator_id=dsr.donator_id WHERE income_donation_no IS NULL

SELECT donation_spend_report_no AS donationSpendReportNo ,donator_id AS donatorId ,donation_plan_no AS donationPlanNo ,donation_report_file_no AS donationReportFileNo ,income_donation_no AS incomeDonationNo ,donation_spend_report_title AS donationSpendReportTitle ,donation_spend_report_content AS donationSpendReportContent ,donation_spend_price_date AS donationSpendPriceDate ,donation_spend_report_record AS donationSpendReportRecord ,LEFT(donation_spend_report_date,10) AS donationSpendReportDate FROM donation_spend_report
SELECT donation_spend_report_no FROM donation_spend_report WHERE donator_id=#{donatorId} ORDER BY donation_spend_report_date DESC LIMIT 1
